rick-and-morty.name: Rick and Morty Character Explorer
details: Developed React app presenting information from the Rick and Morty API
Used React Router for route handling, MobX for state management, Material UI for UI

hot-or-not.name: Hot or Not
details: Developed web game which asks the user to guess which city is currently hotter.
Wrote app using React, OpenWeather API, Teleport Public API and deployed on my VPS using Docker.

prime-cert.name: PrimeCert
details: Developed backend which generates PDF containing prime info based on user input.
Wrote app using Node.JS and deployed as a Docker container.
